colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(CES BCOM LDAN 'DAS PADMA DBANG CHEN RTA MGRIN YANG GSANG KHROS PA'I RTEN GYI DKYIL 'KHOR GYI RNAM BZHAG BDE CHEN RDO RJE'I PHO BRANG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, TSUL 'DI DAG DON DU GNYER BA DAG LA PHAN 'DOD KYI BSAM PAS KUN NAS BLANGS TE, GSANG SNGAGS GSAR RNYING GI CHOS TSUL RGYA MTSO LTA BU LAS CHA SHAS TZAM RE THOB PA'I SKAL PA CAN ^BTZUN GZUGS SNYOM LAS PA DAM TSIG RDO RJES SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI, ZAB MO'I CHOS LA 'DUN PA'I RNAM DPYOD DANG LDAN PA RGYA MTSO LEGS BSHAD DO, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE YONGS SU RDZOGS PA PHYOGS DUS GNAS SKABS THAMS CAD DU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , DZA YANTU, ,)
